data.title: Official NCDMV: Instant Vehicle Titles
data.text:
​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​Title applications require 10-15 business days for processing, but the N.C. Division of Motor Vehicles offers an expedited titling service – referred to as an instant title – in which titles are processed and issued the same day or next business day.

Restrictions

NCDMV can issue instant titles for duplicate title applications that require a 15-day waiting period. The customer would order the instant title and pick it up at the same license plate agency on the 16th day. ​

NCDMV does not issue Instant titles for the following:

Fees

​​​The i​nstant titles are issued over the counter from the following NCDMV offices.
